rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {CER3115, FNA3111, GLS3215, JWL3315, PRM3415, PTG3515, SCU3615}
(Must have passed a unit in {VPR2002} and  Must have passed a unit in {OHS1000})

description: This unit is the fifth in the Visual Practices sequence. In this unit students will focus on their chosen areas of interest reflected in their choice of workshops. Topics will include curatorship, arts writing and a range of contemporary art approaches. A high degree of independence, combined with advanced conceptual lucidity and prowess in the development of curatorial, collective and individual practices should be evident at this stage. Students develop individual programs in conjunction with the lecturers that reflect their personal direction and evolving practice, either curatorial, theoretical or practical.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
